name: Horror Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner monster! Need a chilling name for your horror character, story, or game? Our Horror Name Generator will conjure up the perfect moniker to send shivers down spines. Get ready to embrace the darkness!
introduction: Dare to delve into the abyss? This isn't your average name generator. We're talking bone-chilling, blood-curdling, nightmare-inducing names that will make your audience scream... with delight! Whether you're crafting a terrifying villain, a haunted location, or just looking for a spooky nickname, we've got you covered. Prepare to be horrified...ly impressed.
howToUse: Behold the horrifying name that appears! Mwahahaha!
Don't like it? (Understandable.) Click again for a fresh dose of terror.
Copy and paste your favorite name into your story, game, or creepy social media profile. (Warning: May attract unwanted attention from otherworldly entities.)
Repeat until your soul is sufficiently spooked… or you find the perfect name. Whichever comes first.

faqs.question: Are these names *actually* scary?
faqs.answer: We've tried our best to infuse each name with a healthy dose of dread. But fear is subjective! If you're not scared, you're clearly already a monster. Congrats!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Once generated, the name is yours to use as you wish. Unleash it upon the world! (But maybe credit us if it makes you famous... just sayin'.)

faqs.question: Will using this generator summon demons?
faqs.answer: We can neither confirm nor deny this. Use at your own risk. (But seriously, probably not. Probably.)

faqs.question: What kind of names does this generator create?
faqs.answer: Expect a mix of classic horror tropes, modern terrors, and bizarre abominations. Think gothic castles, ancient evils, and things that go bump in the night... with chainsaws.

faqs.question: The generated name is too silly! Help!
faqs.answer: Sometimes the algorithm has a sense of humor... a *dark* sense of humor. Click 'Generate' again! There are plenty of other horrors lurking in the shadows.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always looking for ways to improve the generator's evil prowess! Send your suggestions our way. If they're spooky enough, we might just add them.
